name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Harry RODRIGUEZ, Appellant

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1013
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Harry RODRIGUEZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 27, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
Nino V. Tinari, Vincent P. DiFabió, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Christine 0. Boyd, Deputy Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
